summary: With this mod you can summon Farm Animals Mounts and Followers (Horse, Sheeps, Pigs, Geese, Chickens, Goats, Cows) wherever you want + You can find 8 Companions (Sheeps, Pig, Geese, Chickens, Goat, Cow) in the Whiterun Stable. New free Sounds for the followers.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size="7"] Farm Animals - Mounts and Followers [/size][/b] [/color] [color=#00ff00]version 2.3 (No DLC required)

Optional Files: Esp version Française[/color]

"Farm Animals" allow you to summon Horse, Sheeps, Pig, Geese, Chickens, Cows and Goats, Mounts and (-simple-) Followers wherever you want.

You can find the 8 Companions/Followers (with speech) near the Whiterun Stable (Sheeps, Pig, Goose, Chickens, Goat, Cow).

[color=#ff0000][b]IMPORTANT:[/b] you have an improved version of this mod here[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79738/?]The Abandoned Farm[/url] ([b]You must remove Farm Animals - Mounts and Followers before installing this one[/b])

[img]https://i.imgur.com/R0n3b34.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000] Farm Mounts are in this Video at 8’12’’ (Mod 5) [/color]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]x9neYHlqfnQ[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=406662FARMANIMALSmountsfollowers.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/406662FARMANIMALSmountsfollowers.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=461426Farmanimalsfollowers2.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/461426Farmanimalsfollowers2.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION[/color]

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

2) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 17 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon Spectral XXXX”, the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”, the “Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Farm animals”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour (15' for the spectral mounts)

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):


[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=175248goatcompanion2.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/175248goatcompanion2.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=673316MountchickenFollowerchicken.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/673316MountchickenFollowerchicken.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]Bugs or Problems[/color]

1) Sometimes there is some "distortions" of the neck of the geese...

The Chickens and the Goose can’t jump, fly or swim…

If you dismount in the water with the Chickens or the Goose, it is possible to swim in the air !! Solution: MOUNT AGAIN or SPACEBAR

2) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

3) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

4) If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=220228summonfarmanimals2.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/220228summonfarmanimals2.jpg[/img][/url]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]fAiyHc_63yM[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000]Credits[/color]

The textures of Goats , Cows and Chickens are from [color=#ff0000] Bellyache [/color]; Mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621 ] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url]("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me").

[color=#ff0000]Macadamstreet [/color] for the meshes and textures of the pig and the goose in his mod [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=125170176&searchtext=]Goosy goosa ! [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Jc1[/color] for the model of the Goose

[color=#ff0000] dogtown1 [/color]to convert the model of the Goose in skyrim, and for the model of the Pig

The meshes and textures of the Sheeps are from [color=#ff0000]stormshallow[/color] in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33273]Sheep Modders Resource [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Umar Muzammil[/color]/[url= http://www.youtube.com/umar6419]UMAR6419 [/url] for the model of the sheep in this site [url= http://thefree3dmodels.com/stuff/0-0-2014-0-17]The free 3D Models [/url] ("You are free to use these models in generating games, animations, multimedia, printed graphics, web graphics and others" and "you are free to distribute and modify the file as long as you attribute it's author(s)")

[color=#ff0000]cansu [/color] for the new texture of the Sheep in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37569/?]stormshallows sheep mod retextured [/url]

The mesh of the Flaming Chicken from [color=#ff0000]Darren83[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54369/?] New Spell -El Pollo Diablo- [/url]

New -Free- Sounds : [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/] universal-soundbank/ [/url]; [url=http://www.sound-fishing.net/bruitages_animaux.html] Sound Fishing [/url] ;[url=http://lasonotheque.org/] lasonotheque [/url] ; [url=http://soundbible.com/] soundbible [/url] and [url=http://www.freesfx.co.uk] freesfx [/url]

[color=#ff0000]testiger2[/color] for the Mesh of the “Pack mule” for the goat in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68149/?] TesTiger's Mesh Resources [/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=757196flamingchicken2.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/757196flamingchicken2.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=485369SHEEPS.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/485369SHEEPS.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=196581MOUNTSHEEPFOLLOWERSSHEEPSCOW.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/196581MOUNTSHEEPFOLLOWERSSHEEPSCOW.jpg[/img][/url]
author: gg77

files.name: Summon Farm Animals - Mounts and Followers 2-3
files.fileName: Summon Farm Animals - Mounts and Followers 2-3-31373-2-3.7z
files.changelogHtml:
New in the version 2.3: New free Sounds for the followers + adds a “Pack mule” for the goat companion

New in the version 2.2: Adds a summonable Flaming Chicken + minor changes

New in the version 2.1: You can easily DISMISS when you want with an other "Spell tome:Dismiss Summoned Farm animals" + minor changes
